overview_of_class:
Solution strategies for traditional word problems and their application to basic chemistry quantitative problems: dimensional analysis, chemical equations, stoichiometry, limiting reagents.

Enrollment only by permission of the Chemistry Department.
Please contact Dr. Fred Northrup at f-northrup@northwestern.edu for more information.
name: Quantitative Problem Solving in Chemistry
title: WCAS CHEM 110-0-01 Quantitative Problem Solving in Chemistry
